text:
Hey all, great to be here :face_with_cowboy_hat:
I'm Chris, and I'm a senior writer and content person. 
I've spent the majority of my career working in-house for int'l startups in the scale-up phase, and slowly transitioned to full-time freelance in the past 1,5 year. :rocket:
When not typing and not keeping the best posture, I'm either walking and talking photos or cooking and not-so-secretly jamming to literally any type of music.

text:
Hi folks! I'm Samridhi (Sam) - a legal writer helping law firms, legal B2B SaaS companies & legal professionals create content! I write blogs, guides, eBooks and more. I help website owners create simply digestible privacy policies and terms of use! I also write website copy for legal tech companies and law firms. 

I help turn legal videos, webinars, and interviews into articles. I'm all ears when it comes to contracts, legal design & coffee! 

Happy to connect :eyes: <https://www.linkedin.com/in/samridhi-writes-legally/|https://www.linkedin.com/in/samridhi-writes-legally/>

text:
Hello! I'm Helene. Currently I am a freelance SEO and content marketing specialist based in Slovenia (although I am American). I'm currently working with SaaS clients to help build out their content strategy.

I got my start as a content creator in the travel industry and now launching a marketing agency to help businesses in responsible tourism and sustainable lifestyle. Happy to connect and chat!

text:
Hi everyone! I'm so happy to finally join the superpath slack. I'm a fan of the newsletter so this has to be great :slightly_smiling_face:

A bit about me... I'm about to start a new role in a new industry - Communications Manager at <https://trustrace.com/|TrusTrace> and am so excited! I love all things content so I'll be checking all the channels. I love that there's a <#C018DRKH0M9|diversity-and-inclusion> channel!!!

I'm originally from Vancouver, Canada and relocated to Stockholm, Sweden :flag-se:  8 years ago.... I am a pittie dogmom :dog2: . Oh and I love to eat knowledge for breakfast, lunch and dinner so let's chat! Happy to join this community :)

text: Hello :wave:! I'm Amber, a partnership manager at Creative Ad-Bundance, a Philadelphia based marketing start-up with a fully remote team (I'm located in Luxembourg). We specialize in creating DR ads at scale and account management for paid social, with all development done in house. Excited to be part of this group - ready to network, learn and share!

text: Hey everyone! I’m Laura, an independent communications consultant. I’m from the UK, and usually live in London, but spending a few months in Ecuador just now. I do a wide range of work: usually helping clients develop strategies for content, comms or political impact; 121 coaching; and I ghostwrite op-eds for high-profile people. Most of my clients are focused on sustainability, in either the private or not-for-profit sectors. Little more about me <https://www.linkedin.com/in/lauratownshend/|here>.

text:
:male-technologist: Hi folks. I’m Francis! Currently working as a Content Marketer at :cloud: <https://air.inc/|Air>, where I’ve been for most of the past year. What is Air? Smart cloud storage for visual content — more visual asset management than simple cloud storage.

Before Air I’d been freelancing for a couple years, both direct clients and UpWork clients. Much happier in a full-time role for now, there’s so much to learn!

Feel free to connect with me on <https://www.linkedin.com/in/francis-zierer|LinkedIn>. Looking forward to exploring the community and learning from y’all.

text:
Hi everyone! My name is Ajay. I'm from Orlando, Florida. I started a business called AJX Media in 2020 and provide web design, graphic design, and social media management for small businesses.

Before that, I worked in Marketing Communications for 10+ years for a large engineering company, where I worked on strategic comms, branding, and collateral and content creation, among other things.

Look forward to connecting with you! :slightly_smiling_face:

text:
Hey Everyone :wave::skin-tone-2:

Its been few days since I am a part of this community and I absolutely love it. Its a positive vibe all around and there is so much to learn for me.

A little about me

My name is Siddhant and I head up Partnerships at PitchGround:technologist::skin-tone-2:

I am inviting a few leaders in the marketing and software space to partner with PitchGround. We are a software marketplace for entrepreneurs and our mission is to grow small businesses.
We are currently offering our new partners a way to monetize their audiences:partying_face:

You can check some of what we have to offer here - <http://pitchground.com/|http://pitchground.com/>

If it is something that excites you then we would love to have you. Do let me know if you are interested and I can shoot over an invite:rocket:

Looking forward to connect with some amazing folks:heart:

Bingo! I am a marketing geek, like marketing is in my veins. I love MarkTech. Human guided automation is what I believe in...

I am here to learn and boost my network.

I am always up for talking about marketing and growth...

Once you talk to me, you will understand that I am super curious. (as curious as kids)

A one-line case study about me

" A digital marketer who specializes in assisting  startups and businesses in generating revenue via the use of digital engines."


Just arrived :dancer:
